body_html:
Since inheriting directly from ActiveRecord::Migration now raises an error (rails/rails@249f71a):
How do you feel about updating old migrations?
Note that the lowest version supported is [4.2], so it would be strange as well. In any case, as of now the migrations are no longer able to run.
body_text:
Since inheriting directly from ActiveRecord::Migration now raises an error (rails/rails@249f71a):
How do you feel about updating old migrations?
Note that the lowest version supported is [4.2], so it would be strange as well. In any case, as of now the migrations are no longer able to run.
body:
Since inheriting directly from ActiveRecord::Migration now raises an error (https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/249f71a22ab21c03915da5606a063d321f04d4d3):
How do you feel about updating old migrations?
Note that the lowest version supported is [4.2], so it would be strange as well. In any case, as of now the migrations are no longer able to run.
